channel.title: Summoning scrolls error
channel.description: Im trying to use the method to add summoning scrolls here and i always get the same error. I can put it in useitemonnpc it works fine but i want the actionbutton to work. It always says it cant find symbol for lastsummon?

item.title: Summoning scrolls error
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

x25xquinton:

Im trying to use the method to add summoning scrolls here and i always get the same error. I can put it in useitemonnpc it works fine but i want the actionbutton to work. It always says it cant find symbol for lastsummon?

That isn’t an Actionbutton, you’re looking for the UseItem packet?

Read full topic
